title: Coven Taliyah
body:
Hello!
Earlier this year, NeburaART and I worked together on creating a coven skin for my main Taliyah. The concept design is focused around witchcraft that is more elemental and throne like rather than Lissandra's type of witchcraft. I love this concept so much because it sheds a different light on Taliyah's personality where in canon lore she is brave, smart and kind, but in the concept she is more ruthless, cocky and evil. I grew up watching shows like Sabrina the teenage witch, charmed and the secret circle. These made me love the coven of sisterhood and witchcraft and such. Therefore, I reached out to Nebura to create something I am very proud of!

replies.body: This is so ridiculously good.  I'm going to share it with our art team so they can come leave you feedback!  As a lowly designer, I don't feel qualified enough to critique something so gorgeous.  0_0

Thank you! NeburaART drew everything from scratch, I was just the "product lead"/ the one who came up with the original concept.
holy cow is this what a job application looks like
Not gonna lie, this skin would be the best of all her available skins.
This needs to gain some traction. You put all of the work needed into developing a skin for Riot! Great Job!
I actually love the red version with ram horns. I think it screams Coven more than the purple verison, which is also nice, but reminds me of dark star
You even got her nose right. Well done!
plz no. no one plays taliyah and i dont want riot to make a skin for her
